mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log (LOG_ID, INTERNAL_SERVER_ID, DATA_CREATED_DATE_TIME_ID, CONNECTED_USER_ID, CONNECTED_USER_REQUEST_INFO_ID, LOG_LEVEL_ID, EXCEPTION_BRIEF, EXCEPTION_DETAIL) VALUES (#{logId}, #{internalServerID}, #{dataCreatedDateTimeID}, #{connectedUserID}, #{connectedUserRequestInfoID}, #{logLevelID}, #{exceptionBrief}, #{exceptionDetail})
mapper.select:
select count(l.log_id) from log as l inner join connected_user as cu on l.connected_user_id = cu.connected_user_id inner join data_created_date_time as dcdt on l.data_created_date_time_id = dcdt.data_created_date_time_id inner join log_level as ll on l.log_level_id = ll.log_level_id inner join server_info as si on l.internal_server_id = si.internal_server_id
where l.log_id like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where ll.level like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where si.server_name like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where si.server_ip like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where cu.user_ip like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where l.exception_brief like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.searchWord}, '%')
where dcdt.data_created_date like CONCAT('%', #{errorLogSearchDTO.inDBDate}, '%')
where dcdt.data_created_date BETWEEN #{errorLogSearchDTO.inDBStartDate} AND #{errorLogSearchDTO.inDBEndDate}
